entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
